Cherrycake\Modules\CacheProviderRedis::touch

touch

Stablishes a new expiration TTL for an element in the Memcached cache.

    Signature

    public function touch(string $key, integer $ttl )

    Parameters

    $key — string
    The identifier key for the object to be touched
    $ttl — integer
    The new TTL (Time To Live) for the stored value in seconds

    Defined by Interface

    CacheProviderInterface
